   GAUSSIAN ELIMINATION FOR SOLVING LINEAR EQUATIONS.

Augmented matrix formed is:
3.000000	1.000000	2.000000	3.000000	
2.000000	-3.000000	-1.000000	-3.000000	
1.000000	2.000000	1.000000	4.000000	
x1 = 1.000000
x2 = 2.000000
x3 = -1.000000
